name: Exam Portal
desc: A full-stack web application built using Django and React for managing online exams, including student registration, question management, and real-time result generation.

name: Live Payment Integration
desc: Implemented a secure payment gateway integration in a Django-based web application, allowing users to make real-time transactions via Razorpay/PayPal/Stripe.

name: Facelock Security system
desc: A Python project using OpenCV to detect faces in real-time from a webcam and create a structured dataset of captured images.

name: Simple Calculator
desc: A simple C program that performs basic arithmetic operations using a switch case and runs continuously until exited by the user..

name: Stone-paper-scissors_Game - C
desc: A Stone, Paper, Scissors game using the C programming language, where you play against the computer with randomized choices.

name: Bank Management System - C
desc: A simple C-based Bank Management System for managing deposits, withdrawals, transfers, and viewing account details with transaction history.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: Personal Portfolio Website. Don't Need Much Info About It, Just Scroll Down. You're Here Only!
